content: Zach —Thank you for sharing your thoughts/feelings in this post. I am sorry for your loss (after all these years). I wanted to share a tid-bit- I have a 10 year old daughter. Her is name is Liv. She is named after one of the victims — Liviu Librescu — who died protecting his students at VT. We never met him but we chose to honour him due to his act of bravery during this incident. We will now think of you and Henh every time we look at her and remind of her of namesake.
